releases.name: v2.29.5
releases.body:
# Changes

The stable release contains numerous bug fixes and device integrations since the last stable version. Please refer to the changelogs of previous beta versions for details:

[v2.29.4-beta](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/releases/tag/v2.29.4-beta)
[v2.29.3-beta](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/releases/tag/v2.29.3-beta)
[v2.29.2-beta](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/releases/tag/v2.29.2-beta)
[v2.29.1-beta](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/releases/tag/v2.29.1-beta)
[v2.29.0-beta](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/releases/tag/v2.29.0-beta)

## Device Support

- DDf for Aeotec (Samjin) water leak sensor's [#8167](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8167)

## ConBee III firmware

Together with this release the new stable firmware version 0x26550900 [Firmware Changelog](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/wiki/Firmware-Changelog) mitigates various reported bugs.

releases.name: v2.29.4-beta
releases.body:
# Contributors: The following users have been contributing to this release. Thank you for that!
@elratt0r and @manup
# Changes ## Device Support - DDF for b-parasite plant sensor [#7972](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7972) ## Bug Fixes - Fix hot reload and events not emitted after joining a device [#8178](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8178) - Fix zombie entries when deleting a device [#8177](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8177) - Fix loading DDF devices from database which weren't fully setup [#8176](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8176) - Fix database not storing / fresh values of strings [#8175](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8175) - Fix to prevent poll attributes after startup if value timestamp is fresh enough [#8174](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8174) - Fix loading Device reachable = true, set to false if older than 24h [#8173](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8173) - Fix don't query binding table for routers with no DDF bindings [#8172](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8172) - Fix possibly wrong destination endpoints for ZCL commands [#8170](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8170) - Fix bogus reading of binding table for sleeping devices with no bindings [#8169](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8169) - Disable ZCL Default Response APS ACKs by default [#8168](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8168)

releases.name: v2.29.3-beta
releases.body:
# Contributors: The following users have been contributing to this release. Thank you for that!
@Smanar, @aSauerwein, @ebaauw, @github-actions[bot], @manup, @mattreim, @pawlizio and @tadeaustria
# Changes ## Device Support - DDF for Shelly 1 Mini Gen4 [#8159](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8159) - DDF for LEDVANCE Plug Z3 [#8161](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8161) - DDF for LEDVANCE PLUG (COMPACT) EU EM T [#8123](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8123) - Updated DDF for frient Intelligent Keypad (KEPZB-110) [#8154](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8154) - DDF for Tuya TRV: Essentials, Revolt, Siterwell, Nedis... [#8046](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8046) - Update ancillary_control.json [#8157](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8157) - DDF for frient Smart Siren (SIRZB-111) [#8155](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8155) - DDF for Schneider Wiser CCT5011-0002 [#8150](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8150) - DDF clone for Tuya 4 Gang Remote (_TZ3000_j61x9rxn) and ZemiSmart ZRM4 (_TZ3000_xwuveizv, _TZ3000_wkai4ga5) [#8134](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8134) - DDF for Tuya vibration sensor (_TZE200_iba1ckek) [#8126](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8126) - DDF for NodOn temperature sensor STPH-4-1-00 [#8137](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8137) - DDF for Third Reality Smart Soil Moisture Sensor (3RSM0147Z) [#8140](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8140) - DDF for Mumibiz TYZGTH4CH relay with temperature (_TZ3218_ya5d6wth) [#8142](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8142) - DDF for Tuya Zigbee mmwave Radar Detektor Luminanz (_TZE204_ex3rcdha) [#8144](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8144) - DDF clone for Tuya 24G Radar Motion Sensor (_TZE204_ztqnh5cg) [#8136](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8136) - DDF for GE Jasco on/off and dimmable lights (43076, 43080, 43100, 43102) [#8127](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8127) ## Breaking Changes Final removal of `config/temperature` from more Xiaomi devices (part 2) [#8156](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8156) This attribute caused much confusion in the past due the misleading name. It was more often than not mistaken as ambient temperature. We think the value that was exposed in the attribute reflects the device on chip temperature, but that's just a guess. For sensors which do actually provide ambient temperature readings we have the `state/temperature` attribute. If in future the need comes up to bring the attribute back it will be under a proper name like `state/chip_temperature`. ## Enhancements - DDF improve Aqara relay T2 switch [#8163](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8163) - Remove legacy code for Ikea remote control [#8158](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8158) - Expose button events from DDF [#8151](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8151) - Refactor button maps (part 1) [#8149](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8149) - Refactor the Unix serial driver to handle faster and larger messages [d69c0b](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz/commit/d69c0b0d2ef5b39693299c27b963862b842d20cc) - Force removal of dead and zombie source routes [b5e15d](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz/commit/b5e15d576c50439ddf384d81834313c6b2135fed) - Include GCFFlasher [v4.8.0](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/gcfflasher/releases/tag/v4.8.0) - First version with deticated macOs Apple Silicon version, formerly only the Intel version could be run in emulated mode. ## Bug Fixes - New beta firmware version 0x26540900 for ConBee III to fix pairing and lost devices issues and various other improvements [Firmware Changelog](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/wiki/Firmware-Changelog) - Fix "zombie" offline device detection [c8966c](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz/commit/c8966ca1fff0ed180d5111be0475ad5b804731dd) - Fix StateChange requests while end device is sleeping [#8165](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8165) - Fix dead unicast bindings to non existing nodes by unbinding them automatically [#8165](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8165) - Fix vendor, state and add cooling mode to Bosch room thermostat II 230V (BTH-RM230Z) [#8084](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8084) - Removing the file paths from DDFs [#8153](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8153) - Fix printf format warnings [#8147](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8147) - Prevent initial setup crash in debug build [#8146](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8146) - Fix siren of Frient Intelligent smoke alarm (SMSZB-120) #8040 [#8145](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8145) - Fix Aqara vibration sensor sensitivity configuration [#8135](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/8135) - The Home Assistant deCONZ Add-on now switched to OpenBox window manager to fix various usability issues with former DWM window manager [#home-assistant/pull/3966](https://github.com/home-assistant/addons/pull/3966#event-17169744616)

releases.body:
# Contributors: The following users have been contributing to this release. Thank you for that!
@Smanar, @SwoopX, @Zehir and @manup
# Changes ## Device Support - DDF clone for Tuya Soil sensor (_TZE204_myd45weu) [#7808](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7808) - DDF for Drayton Wiser Radiator Thermostat iTRV [#7801](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7801) - Add DDF for Wiser room thermostat CCTFR6400 [#7798](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7798) ## Enhancements - BufString use U_ASSERT() instead of assert() [#7809](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7809) - DDF loader improve logging; load DDFs where manufacturer name constant is unknown [#7796](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7796) ## Bug Fixes - Fix DDF get descriptors request [#7803](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7803) - Fix loading OpenSSL library [#7802](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7802) [4b34e5](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-lib/commit/4b34e5160c07fcf6725840c28f2ac6bf14912096) [5c424b](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-lib/commit/5c424b6e3120c0148350302fc2f848df7760a5bd) - Fix Xiaomi curtain file extension [#7797](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7797) - Fix atom table assigning 0 index on some setups which made problems while loading DDFs [6e4766](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-lib/commit/6e4766c136c84b720217f0781ad215cf24ee986f) ## Misc Work has started to support HTTPS / SSL connections, by default with self signed certificates. This should land in a few weeks for testing and also gets rid of Qt Network and Websockets modules. In contrast to the current the new implementation supports IPv4 and IPv6 on the same listening sockets. As SSL backend OpenSSL is used, with the goal to support others like WolfSSL in future.

A Zip file can contain one or multiple bundles. - Improve bulk upload of DDF bundles and hotreload [#7792](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7792) - REST API remove single DDF descriptor request [#7790](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7790) - REST API GET DDF bundle descriptor, return file hash [#7789](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7789) - Log which modelid / manufacturer names lookup DDFs [#7788](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7788) - REST API improve DDF upload error reporting [#7791](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7791) - Add interaction dispatcher workflow [#7772](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7772) - Rename Marthoc-docker to deconz-docker in bug_report.yml [#7768](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7768)

releases.name: v2.27.0-beta
releases.body:
# Contributors: The following users have been contributing to this release. Thank you for that!
@BottlecapDave, @Mimiix, @Smanar, @SveLil, @SwoopX, @Zehir, @aSauerwein, @dmichalski, @ebaauw, @fox34, @isaksengeir, @lhering, @manup, @mattreim, @retrography, @ringelbaer and @taby1
# Changes This release has two larger highlights. ## deCONZ is now Open Source Since 2012 the deCONZ core application, aka the GUI that runs the REST-API plugin was Closed Source and is now released as Open Source in the https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz GIT repository. This is the first release build from that repository. Reach out to the repository description to read about the goals and future development path of deCONZ. ## DDF Bundle Support The second big change is the new DDF Bundle feature as tech preview. This brings: * Faster shipping of device integrations * Independent of deCONZ releases * Much more robustness, since new DDFs / bundles can't break others and can be rolled back on a per device basis. * Automatic CI builds for test versions of new DDF bundles during GitHub PRs **For example:** When a new device gets supported or updated you only need to upload one DDF bundle (file extension `.ddf`) via Phoscon App or REST-API. It is picket up right away for respective devices. No need to update or even restart deCONZ. ![image](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/assets/383386/ea58e4b9-8e7a-41ad-96be-b2330e29bc1f) This release only has a rudimentary UI in the Phoscon App to upload new DDF bundles. This will be extended to provide more easily accessible control available already via REST-API. ----------------------- There are also new Web based community projects as [https://deconz-community.github.io/ddf-tools](https://deconz-community.github.io/ddf-tools/#/store/search?manufacturer=ikea&showStableOnly=false) in development to tinker with and search for DDF bundles, which will play an important role soon. ![image](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/assets/383386/3dc6054e-bfa2-4719-8bf8-7785d6790f4b) For more technical under the hood details and what the fuzz is about please visit [#7750](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7750). **Work in Progress:** There is one notable limitation that switches which depend on `button_maps.json` aren't handled fully by bundles yet, this will be resolved soon. **Note for Developers:** From the workflow perspective how to edit DDFs this still works as before by editing the usual JSON files. These are also shipped as before in the `devices/` directory. Via REST-API a device can be instructed to use bundles or raw JSON files with hot-reload. The bundles themself are build by CI in PRs. A more detailed picture will be given in a live session :) ## Device Support - DDF for Tapestry Presence Z1 [#7657](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7657) - DDF for Yagusmart Zigbee Smart Wall Light Switch 1 Gang No Neutral Wire Required [#7699](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7699) - Normalized names for Tuya remotes and added variant for TZ3000_TS0041 [#7718](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7718) - DDF add tuya clone for Soil sensor [#7753](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7753) - DDF clone for Namron Touch thermostat 16A (4512752) [#7731](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7731) - DDF clone for Tuya door sensor (_TZ3000_1bwpjvlz) [#7700](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7700) - DDF for Moes ZM-105-M 1 gang dimmer (_TZE204_dcnsggvz) [#7708](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7708) - DDF for Moes ZM-105-M 1-Gang Dimmer Module [#7715](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7715) - DDF clones for Hue white ambiance ZB3 lights (LTA009, LTU001, 915005996501) [#7694](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7694) - DDF for IKEA TRADFRI Driver 30W [#7695](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7695) - Add DDF for icasa AC Dimmer ICZB-IW11D [#7697](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7697) - DDF for Ikea Badring water leak sensor [#7707](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7707) - Fix state of Hue lights not always updated correctly [#7704](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7704) - DDF clones for Tuya TS0210 vibration sensors and renamed DDF [#7706](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7706) - DDF clone for Tuya 2-gang switch (_TZ3000_mtnpt6ws) [#7712](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7712) - DDF clone for Tuya _TZ3000_TS011F_smart_plug [#7717](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7717) - DDF for Aqara curtain driver E1 Rod Version ZNCLBL01LM [#7572](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7572) - DDF for Sunricher Ceiling Mount Microwave Occupancy Sensor SR-ZG9030A-MW [#7677](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7677) - DDF for Bosch Light/shutter control II [#7683](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7683) - Add support for Hue LWA028 [#7690](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7690) - DDF Tuya multi sensor clone (_TZE200_zl1kmjqx) [#7658](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7658) - DDF Tuya clone _TZ3000_hhiodade and update general.xml [#7680](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7680) - DDF for Tuya smoke sensor YG400A (_TZ3210_up3pngle) [#7593](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7593) - DDF for Namron 4512762 open/close sensor [#7594](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7594) - DDF for Aqara T1 wireless mini switch WB-R02D [#7595](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7595) - DDF for Xiaomi Aqara wireless switch WXKG11LM [#7590](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7590) - DDF for Xiaomi Mijia Wireless Switch WXKG01LM [#7589](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7589) - DDF for IKEA ASKVADER on/off switch [#7592](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7592) - DDF for Sonoff SNZB-06P [#7582](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7582) - DDF for Bosch Thermostat II 230V [#7575](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7575) - DDF for Sonoff TRVZB Thermostat [#7357](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7357) ## Enhancements - Support for DDF bundles [#7750](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7750) - Add workflow for DDF Bundles [#7743](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7743) - Add UUID for all DDF files [#7742](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7742) - Remove referer filter on deletePassword endpoint [#7749](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7749) - Make various database function local to database.cpp [#7727](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7727) - Improve support for GET file HTTP response [#7725](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7725) - Use modelid.toLatin1String() in sendConfigureReportingRequest() [#7724](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7724) - Refactor string cache to use atom table [#7723](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7723) - Add CJ JSON parser [#7722](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7722) - Add scratch memory allocator [#7721](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7721) - DDF set Gold status for Moes MS-104BZ [#7714](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7714) ## Bug Fixes - Fix Ikea Rodret group bindings/button events [#7757](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7757) - Fix script paths for DDF files [#7726](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7726) - Fix introspect response [#7751](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7751) - Update API responses for time config [#7745](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7745) - Fix typo in group api [#7748](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7748) - Remove unused Ikea blind DDF's [#7736](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7736) - Fix pairing Profalux roller shutter in legacy code [#7735](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7735) - Add missing file extension [#7732](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7732) - Removing erroneous temperature exposure for Aqara SSM-U01 switch [#7719](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7719) - Fix state of Hue lights not always updated correctly [#7704](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7704) - Fix temperature reporting for Aqara Single Switch Module T1 (With Neutral) SSM-U01 [#7650](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7650) - Revert "DDF clone for Namron Touch thermostat 16A (4512752)" [#7733](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7733)

releases.name: v2.26.2-beta
releases.body:
# Contributors: The following users have been contributing to this release. Thank you for that!
@Markkuuss, @SwoopX, @ebaauw and @manup
This is the last small beta before the stable version expected in a few days. # Changes ## Device Support - DDF for Aqara E1 Water Leak Sensor SJCGQ13LM [#7676](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7676) - Mode in State attribute in Hue Effects cluster as bitmap [#7652](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7652) ## Enhancements - Don't load rules lasttriggered and timestriggered from database [#7678](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7678) - Replace use of deCONZ::jsonStringFromMap() by Json::serialize() [#7675](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7675) - Improve rules database handling [#7672](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7672) - Move REST API common code to rest_api.cpp/h [#7674](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7674) - Fix printf format warnings and align DEV prefix in device.cpp [#7669](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7669) - Show used OpenSSL version in about dialog. - Improve fonts on Windows and macOS in about and main window connection dialogs. ## Bug Fixes - DDF for ubisys S1(-R) corrected [#7630](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7630) - Use bundled OpenSSL on macOS [#7668](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7668) - Show correct deCONZ version in macOS app bundle details [#7670](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/issues/7670) ## Upcoming v2.27.0-beta The next beta release is cooking behind the curtains and contains larger refactoring on how DDFs are loaded and initial *beta* support for [DDF bundles](https://dresden-elektronik.github.io/deconz-rest-doc/endpoints/ddf). These are an evolution of how device integrations are currently distributed. For example, if in a deCONZ setup running via Home Assistant add-on you want to use a freshly created device integration for some device, currently this requires waiting for a new deCONZ release. With DDF bundles this becomes independent of the deCONZ release cadence: And just one small file for the new device needs to be uploaded (via REST-API / web UI). The idea is, that if a new device is added, or a bug is fixed for a device, users can test it right away and also revert back easily.

releases.name: v2.26.1-beta
releases.body:
# Contributors: The following users have been contributing to this release. Thank you for that!
@Fischelsberger, @Smanar, @SwoopX, @jan666, @manup, @mattreim and @retrography
# Changes ## Device Support - DDF clone for Tuya 2 channel module (_TZ3000_nuenzetq) [#7624](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7624) - DDF clone for Tuya contact sensor (_TZ3000_zgrffiwg) [#7631](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7631) - DDF variant for Tuya 2-channel switch (_TZ3000_lmlsduws) [#7612](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7612) - DDF for LEDVANCE A60 FIL DIM T [#7610](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7610) - DDF for OSRAM PAR16 50 TW (GU10) [#7609](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7609) ## Enhancements - DDF for Ikea on/off switch firmware versions before 0x23079631 [#7643](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7643) Note: After the update it can take a while until the new DDF is picket up, pressing the top button and waiting for ca. 1 minute should complete the process. - Expose OTA file version for matchexpr [#7642](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7642) - DEV refresh non sleeper endpoints and simple descriptors once per session [#7637](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7637) - JS add R.hasCluster(ep,clusterId [,side]) [#7634](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7634) - Remove old and unused QT Javascript engine code [#7629](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7629) - Refactor DuktapeJS memory management, use deCONZ library [#7628](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7628) - Prevent store ResourceItem item of RDevice resource in APS indication [#7627](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7627) - Don't poll unsupported ZCL attributes more than once [#7625](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7625) - Relax reporting interval of Sonfoff SNZB-02 multisensor [#7616](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7616) - More detailed ZGP logging, relax Friends of Hue switch detection [#7611](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7611) - Improve ResourceItem::setValue() usage in Device class [#7607](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7607) - Add default refresh.interval of 5 secs to state/hue item [#7606](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7606) - DDF support disable binding table requests [#7605](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7605) - deCONZ core now tries to extract the extended address of an incoming packet from the neighbor tables if it isn't known otherwise. This prevents things getting stuck in case a device changes it's NWK address. - Support `--dev` parameter on Windows [d12e75](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-lib/commit/d12e7593c0de22eb32f84520ebcabf97a9a14180) - GCFFlasher shipped with deCONZ updated to version v4.4.0 ## Bug Fixes - Fix adding non existing clusters to devices and shown in the GUI, this could have happened when requests for such a cluster were send to a device and it responded with ZCL unsupported attribute status code. - Philips Hue ZLL/ZB3 match DDF only for newer firmware [#7635](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7635) - Fix non stop reading of binding table for legacy devices [#7638](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7638) - Fix consumption reporting for Lidl SilverCrest (_TZ3000_j1v25l17) [#7621](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7621) - Fix negative value for sensitivity for Aqara/Xiaomi vibration sensor [#7618](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7618) - Fix StateChange write with invalid values on boot [#7626](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7626) - Fix OSRAM Classic A60 W clear crash [#7613](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7613) - Fix OSRAM Classic A60 RGBW crash [#7608](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7608) - Fix for IKEA Tradfri control outlet [#7604](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7604) - Fix unnecessary read requests for some Xiaomi devices [#7602](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7602) ## New Phoscon App Automations feature (BETA) The old sensor control is quite limited in support for various sensors. Automations are our new generic way to setup rules with sensors and other devices. Read more about it on https://phoscon.de/en/app/doc#group-automation-en ![image](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/assets/383386/ecc72556-7991-455e-b769-70b235e29023) ## ConBee II Zigbee firmware The sources for the firmware have been ported to build via GCC instead of IAR compiler in a modern environment. This allows to use better tools like static analyzers to fix bugs. And more importantly using a debugger directly with the device. It's been a while since the last ConBee II firmware was released, a new one is scheduled to fix a few bugs and support Install Codes without hacks.

releases.name: v2.25.3
releases.body:
# Contributors: The following users have been contributing to this release. Thank you for that!
@ebaauw and @manup
# Changes ## Bug Fixes - Prevent heavy database writes during APS indications [#7578](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7578) - Fix handling Hue Effects state attribute [#7576](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7576) - Fix MHCOZY 4-Channel SyntaxError: unterminated statement (_TZ3000_u3oupgdy) [#7577](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7577) ## Misc A new ConBee III deCONZ firmware version is currently under testing and should arrive within a few days. The new version addressed joining related problems which can cause reliable operation and battery drain of some devices like Ikea. ## OpenThread We have released a first public OpenThread beta firmware for ConBee II and ConBee III. Visit https://phoscon.de/openthread/doc for a description on how to join a Thread Eve smart plug via ConBee as Border Router and Home Assistant as Matter controller.

releases.body:
# Contributors: The following users have been contributing to this release. Thank you for that!
@BEskandari, @Smanar, @SwoopX, @Verteo, @andreas5232, @chbndrhnns, @ebaauw, @jmue, @manup, @noud-github, @retrography and @traschke
This release took a while to cook and address performance issues. If no new bugs are discovered the stable release should follow in two days. # Changes ## Device Support - DDF for Philips Signe floor lamp (4080248P9) [#7562](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7562) - New `modelid` values for Hue smart button and Hue wall switch module [#7567](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7567) - DDF add clone of Tuya temperature and humidy sensor (TZE200_locansqn) [#7523](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7523) - DDF for Avatto TRV16 and TRV06 TRVs + add support for offset (_TZE200_TS0601) [#7537](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7537) - DDF add Tuya water sensor clone (_TZ3000_kstbkt6a) [#7549](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7549) - IKEA SOMRIG Shortcut Button support [#7511](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7511) - DDF for Hue lightstrip plus (LCL006) [#7521](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7521) - DDF for Xiaomi MHO-C401N temperature and humidity sensor [#7528](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7528) - DDF for IKEA bulb E14 W opal 400lm [#7527](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7527) - DDF Add support for Doorlock clone from Onesti Products AS [#7534](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7534) - Add two new aliexpress manufacturers for Tuya TS0041 smart button [#7520](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7520) - DDF for Osram Plug 01 [#7522](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7522) - DDF for LIDL Livarno window blinds (Tuya) [#7325](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7325) - IKEA Vallhorn motion sensor device request [#7513](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7513) ## Enhancements - Optimize idle timer and legacy device polling [#7574](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7574) - Skip more legacy code for DDF devices [#7571](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7571) - Optimize updatedLightNodeEndpoint() [#7570](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7570) - Remove legacy FLS-PP (version 1) color XY quirk [#7569](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7569) - DDF for Avatto TRV16 and TRV06 TRVs + add support for offset (_TZE200_TS0601) [#7537](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7537) - Make Ikea Parasoll IAS Zone enrollment more robust [#7560](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7560) ## Bug Fixes - Fix macOS doesn't auto connect to ConBee if already attached before starting deCONZ. - Fix display of LQI values (note LQI text drawing is still slow). - Fix regression from v2.24.1 that UI and Zigbee processing can become very slow with high CPU usage - Fix battery spamming on Tuya smart button IH-663 [#7509](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7509) - Fix CentraLite Motion Sensor-A detection [#7565](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7565) - Fix non-functioning Aqara T1 open/close sensor [#7559](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7559) - Fix setting `config/displayflipped` and `config/externalsensortemp` for Bosch thermostat II [#7517](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7517)

releases.name: v2.24.3
releases.body:
# Changes

- Fix Phoscon App Home Assistent add-on login and Ingress support.

## Back ported fixes from v2.25.0-beta and v2.25.1-beta

- Fix missing bash scripts in .deb package.
- Fix missing deCONZ start menu icon on Linux.
- Improved application based source routing.
- Fix filter ZGP command duplication filtering when more than one frame counter is on air
- Fix wrong sign applying `config/offset` to `state/measured_value` [#7389](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7389)
- Stop unnecessary attribute read requests for many Philips/Signify devices [#7384](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7384)
- Restore `parse` functions for `maufacturername` and `modelid` [#7405](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7405)
- Fix LIDL smart plug consumption value multiplier [#7361](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7361)
- Speed up first time loading of DDF for former legacy lights [#7446](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7446)
- Fix generated scene names [#7461](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7461)
- Force classic join/re-join for devices [#7497](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7497)

# Contributors: The following users have been contributing to this release. Thank you for that!
@ChrisHae, @Smanar, @SwoopX, @aronsky, @jmue and @manup
# Changes ## Device Support - DDF for IKEA Ormanas led strip [#7420](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7420) - DDF for Zemismart 1-gang Remote (_TZ3000_tk3s5tyg) [#7487](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7487) - DDF for Develco/frient temperature/humidity sensor HMSZB-120 [#7506](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7506) - DDF for Bosch room thermostat II (BTH-RM) [#7504](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7504) - DDF add support for WOOLLEY/eWeLink SmartPlug CK-BL702-SWP-01(7020) [#7488](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7488) - DDF for innr SP 240 [#7486](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7486) - DDF for newer version of Popp smart thermostat eT093WRG [#7491](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7491) - DDF for Hive Radiator Valve [#7474](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7474) - Show a text "DDF" label on nodes which run on DDF to easily spot legacy code devices - Improve maintenance of application level source routing to figure out working source routes and discard non-working ones. Note for ConBee III this is currently disabled but will be enabled soon - Improve detection of ConBee I, II and III device name inside Docker container ## Bug Fixes - Fix missing deCONZ start menu entry on Linux - Fix filter ZGP command duplication filtering when more than one frame counter is on air - Fix button handlers for dresden elektronik Scene Switch [#7503](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7503) - Force classic join/re-join for devices [#7497](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7497) - Fix `config/mode` for ubisys devices S1/S2(-R)/J1(-R) [#7493](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7493) - Fix WiFi scripts missing in .dep package

# Contributors: The following users have been contributing to this release. Thank you for that!
@1100101, @BabaIsYou, @Finne75, @GabeHH78, @Monofin, @Pirionfr, @Smanar, @SwoopX, @Zehir, @bluemoehre, @ebaauw, @gladhorn, @malwcal, @manup and @steljwagh
# Changes ## Device Support - DDF for Tuya bidirectional energy meter (_TZE204_ac0fhfiq) [#7204](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7204) - DDF for Greeble JZ-RGBW-Z01 light [#7465](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7465) - DDF for dresden elektronik scene and lighting switches [#7464](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7464) - DDF for Philips Hue White Ambiance E27 Edison ST64 Filament 550lm [#7408](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7408) - DDF for ubisys H1 thermostat [#7421](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7421) - DDF optimizations for Danfoss Ally [#7460](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7460) - Add DDF for MHCOZY ZG-005-RF [#7310](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7310) - Create light_zll_white_ambiance.json [#7451](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7451) - Bug fix IKEA VINDSTYRKA: Translate VOC index to tVOC level. [#7297](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7297) - Add `config/bri/couple_ct` to IKEA lights that support it. [#7268](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7268) - Add `config/bri/couple_ct` to Hue lights that support it. [#7267](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7267) - DDF for Ikea Parasoll open/close sensor [#7445](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7445) - DDF for TRÅDFRI LED bulb E14 250lm warm white clear chandelier [#7337](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7337) - DDF add variant of Tuya presence sensor (_TZ3000_lf56vpxj) [#7402](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7402) - DDF add variant of Tuya Smart Button IH-663 (_TZ3000_fa9mlvja) [#7447](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7447) - DDF for Sonoff/zbeacon DS01 open/close sensor [#7444](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7444) - Add the SNZB-02P variant of the sensor to the DDF [#7422](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7422) - DDF for Namron S903TH-ZG multisensor [#7406](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7406) - DDF for Tradfri bulb GU10 CWS 345lm [#7320](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7320) - DDF for Woox R7049 Smart Smoke Alarm [#7404](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7404) - DDF add support for Xiaomi LYWSD03MMC [#7373](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7373) - DDF for Tuya micro motion sensor ZY-M100-24G [#7403](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7403) - DDF for Elko Smart ZB Thermostat 16 A (#7225) [#7270](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7270) - Fix validation errors [#7359](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7359) - DDF for various Merten / Schneider dimmer and simple switch [#7356](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7356) - DDF clone for Tuya presence sensor (_TZ3040_bb6xaihh) [#7385](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7385) - DDF clone for Tuya Mercator 1-gang switch module (_TZ3000_7jsk6lxz) [#7366](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7366) - DDF clone for Tuya temperature and humidy sensor (_TZ3000_saiqcn0y) [#7372](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7372) - DDF for Tuya Fingerbot [#7393](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7393) - DDF for Bosch Smoke Alarm II (#9) [#7354](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7354) ## Enhancements - Add further Danfoss specific resource items [#6175](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/6175) - Make sensors attr/mode a ResourceItem [#7462](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7462) - DDF support "cmd": "any" wildcard [#7452](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7452) - Add `config/bri/couple_ct` to IKEA lights that support it. [#7268](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7268) - Add `config/bri/couple_ct` to Hue lights that support it. [#7267](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7267) - Add `config/bri/couple_ct` item [#7265](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7265) - C++ Add support for set Level for Legrand covering [#7410](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7410) - Fix naming convention for generic files [#7426](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7426) - Use constants for bwa-1_water_sensor.json [#7428](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7428) - Use constants for smszb-120_smoke_detector.json [#7433](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7433) - Use constants for heszb-120_heat_detector.json [#7434](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7434) - Use constants for smszb-120_smoke_detector.json [#7435](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7435) - Use constants for heszb-120_heat_detector.json [#7436](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7436) - Use constants for _TZ3000_bmfw9ykl_vibration_sensor.json [#7429](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7429) - Use constants for 3RWS18BZ_water_sensor.json [#7427](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7427) - Use constants for xiaomi_jtqj-bf-01lm_gas_leak_detector.json [#7440](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7440) - Speed up first time loading of DDF for former legacy lights [#7446](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7446) - Update lxn59-1s7lx1.0 Smart plug DDF to Gold [#7409](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7409) - Update hg08673 smartplug DDF to Gold [#7407](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7407) - DDF Add tuya_unlock to _TZ3000_ja5osu5g moes (tuya) smart button [#7362](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7362) - DDF Gold status for TONGOU TO-Q-SY1-ZT [#7395](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7395) - Add ddfvalidate validation option [#7300](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7300) - Enable setting/viewing write functions in DDF editor [#7371](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7371) ## Bug Fixes - Fix a problem for the Legrand Wireless Scenes command [#7466](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7466) - Fix generated scene names [#7461](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7461) - Bug fix IKEA VINDSTYRKA: Translate VOC index to tVOC level. [#7297](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7297) - Remove duplicate device identifier for _TZ3000_TS011F_PowerStrip.json [#7443](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7443) - Remove duplicate device identifier for _TZ3000_TS0207_water_leak_sens… [#7442](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7442) - Fix path for xiaomi_firmware.js for xiaomi_zncz12lm_smart_plug.json [#7439](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7439) - Fix path of xiaomi_firmware.js for xiaomi_sp-euc01_smart_plug.json [#7437](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7437) - Fix path of tuya_swversion.js for zb003-x_multi_sensor.json [#7432](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7432) - Fix path of tuya_swversion.js for bw_is4_multisensor.json [#7431](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7431) - Fix path of tuya_swversion.js for Woox_R7049_Smart_Smoke_Alarm.json [#7430](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7430) - Update cap measured generic file names [#7412](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7412) - Fix LIDL smart plug consumption value multiplier [#7361](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7361) - DDF, solve DDF validation for the Tuya fingerbot [#7397](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7397) - Restore `parse` functions for `maufacturername` and `modelid` [#7405](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7405) - Stop unnecessary attribute read requests for many Philips/Signify devices [#7384](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7384) - Fix validation errors [#7359](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7359) - Bug fix: wrong sign applying `config/offset` to `state/measured_value` [#7389](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7389)

releases.name: v2.24.2
releases.body:
# Changes

- Fix Hue lights validator errors [#7285](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7285)
- Fix wrong value for `state/open` on window covering devices [#7314](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7314)
- Correct battery reporting attribute for Aqara E1 open/close sensor MCCGQ14LM [#7279](https://github.com/dresden-elektronik/deconz-rest-plugin/pull/7279)
- Fix potential crashes during device pairing
- Fix macOS backup/restore
- Code sign and notarize macOS version
